Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-45619 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-45619 affecting package opensc for versions less than 0.23.0-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package opensc is earlier than 0.23.0-5, affected by CVE-2024-45619
